name: Thanksgiving Cake Maker Make & Bake Dessert Food
name_original: Thanksgiving Cake Maker Make & Bake Dessert Food
description:
Thanksgiving Cake Maker is taking the dessert world by storm! Make beautiful, holiday cakes and treats. A little indulgence doesn't have to be that bad . . . You can have your cake, and eat it, too! (Ad FREE App)

Tons of Thanksgiving and fall themed decorations! Like Turkeys, Scarecrows, Fall Leaves, Pumpkins, Pilgrims, Cranberries, Acorns, Cornucopias and more!

Make, bake, decorate and eat homemade Thanksgiving Cakes! If you like cupcakes and cake pops, you will love this Sweet game!

Start by mixing the ingredients for a Cake flavor of your choice:
- Milk Chocolate
- Dark Chocolate
- Red Velvet
- Confetti
- Mint
- Vanilla
- Marble
- Orange

Then, select your Cake shape:
- Circle
- Square
- Star
- Heart
- Flower

Now, choose a Background and Decorate with Toppings from Turkeys to Pilgrims:
- Numerous Frostings and Whip Cream
- Tons of Toppings including Fruits & Nuts, Thanksgiving Candy, Ice Cream, holiday Décor and Candles
- Celebrating a Birthday, top off your Cake with Candles and Sprinkles
- NO advertisements!

When you're done indulging, eat your Thanksgiving Cake or save it to the Photo Gallery.

Thanksgiving Cake Maker features:
- Ad Free App
- Frostings from Orange Butter Cream to Confetti
- Ice Cream from Pistachio to Cherry
- Candy from Black Licorice to Chocolate Footballs
- Fruit from Cherries to Blueberries
- Nuts from Cashews to Walnuts
- Décor from Turkeys to Fall Leaves
- Glowing Candles
- Eat Cake Creation
- Save Thanksgiving Cake to Photo Gallery

Thanksgiving Cake Maker Instructions:
Select cake flavor. Mix ingredients. Bake cake batter. Select cake shape. Begin decorating cake and select background. Finish by eating cake and save to photo gallery.
